select

SELECT
FROM um_kh_user_jz u WHERE u.id = #{id} and u.uuid=#{uuid} and u.status <> 9
mapper.delete: update um_kh_user_jz set status=9,updateTime=now() where id=#{id} and uuid=#{uuid} and status <> 9

update um_kh_user_jz set status=9,updateTime=now() where status <> 9 and id in
#{id}
